channel.title: Hacker. Fixed by myself
channel.description:
[s]I have a wonderful hacker. Server base is PI, he loves to log in with no log or anything and just ban people. I thought it was one of my mods doing something stupid that was going to get them demoted, but nope... I didn't realize until he banned me..
Is this seriously a hacker or a glitch that randomly bans people after a certain amount of time being online or whatever???
Please help me I don't know what to do and I might just shut down the server...[/s]
Hackers were IP banned and fixed the problem.

item.title: Hacker. Fixed by myself

item.description:

I didn’t realize until he banned me…
